name: market for collector field area, solar tower power plant, 20 MW | collector field area, solar tower power plant, 20 MW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17765/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'collector field area, solar tower power plant, 20 MW', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a collector field area, solar tower power plant, 20 MW. The process  represents the construction of large two-axis tracked mirrors that are installed around a receiver tower to serve as component of a solar tower power plant.  These slightly curved mirrors are also called heliostats. The infrastructure has a capacity of 20 MW, a total collector area of 215,520 m2 and a lifetime of 30 years. The process includes building materials for the construction, operationalization and maintenance for the solar power plant.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
